author: Chelsea Ritschel, Chelsea Ritschel
title: Bulldog named Big Poppa goes viral after sad quarantine photo: 'Most precious thing I have seen'
description: 'If you aren't staying at home you are actively contributing to Big Poppa's frown and that cannot be tolerated'
content:
A bulldog named Big Poppa has captured the hearts of thousands on the internet after his owner shared a picture of the pup looking forlorn while following social distancing orders.
As people around the world continue to stay home in an effort to curb the spr… [+3419 chars]
